Sq'irk trees are a species of tree that are found in the Sorceress's Garden minigame. They stand at the end of each maze and will each yield a certain type of sq'irk fruit. The type of sq'irk that is yielded depends on which maze the player is in. The types of sq'irk trees are winter, spring, autumn, and summer trees. Picking a sq'irk will give a player 20 to 60 Farming experience. When a sq'irk is picked off the tree, the player will magically be teleported outside of the maze.

These trees cannot be chopped down.

'''Sq'irk trees''' are a species of tree that are found in the [[Sorceress's Garden]] [[minigame]]. They stand at the end of each maze and will each yield a certain type of [[sq'irk]] fruit. The type of sq'irk that is yielded depends on which maze the player is in. The types of sq'irk trees are winter, spring, autumn, and summer trees. Picking a sq'irk will give a player 20 to 60 Farming experience. When a sq'irk is picked off the tree, the player will magically be teleported outside of the maze.

These trees cannot be chopped down.
